insufficientFundsNotification.message: Akaunto yako ya Brave Rewards inasubiri amana.

contributeNotificationError.message: Kulikuwa na tatizo kuchakatata mchango wako.

contributeNotificationNotEnoughFunds.message: Uliratibu malipo ya kila mwezi ya Auto-Contribute na michango ya kila mwezi haikukamilishwa kutokana na kutokuwepo fedha za kutosha. Tutajaribu tena baada ya siku 30.

contributeNotificationTipError.message: Imeshindwa kukutumia kidokezo. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.

captchaDrag.message: Buruza ikoni ya BAT ili kuiweka kwenye

grantExpire.message: Tarehe ya Mwisho ya Kuisha Ruzuku

grantGeneralErrorText.message: Kuna tatizo kwenye Zawadi za Brave. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.

grantGeneralErrorTitle.message: Ayaa, kuna kitu hakiko sawa. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.

unVerifiedCheck.description: Text of link that allows to check verified status of unverified publisher

unVerifiedPublisher.description: Status of the publisher shown in the panel

unVerifiedText.message: Mtengeneza maudhui huyu bado hajajisajili ili kuanza kupokea michango kutoka kwa watumiaji wa Brave. Zawadi yoyote utakayotuma itabaki kwenye wallet yako hadi watakapothibitisha.

unVerifiedTextMore.description: Text for the link that explains more about reserved amount

reservedAmountText.message: Umeweka {{sarafu}}{{kiwango}}kwa watengenezaji ambao bado hawajajisajili ili kupokea michango. Kisakuzi chako kitaendelea kujaribu kuchangia hadi watakapothibitisha, au hadi siku 90 zitakapokuwa zimepita.
reservedAmountText.description: Notification about how much BAT do you have reserved

reservedMoreLink.description: Text for the link that explains more about reserved amount

disabledPanelOff.description: Off state text for Panel's disabled state

disabledPanelText.message: Kwa sasa hupati mafao ya Zawadi huku ukiwa unavinjari. Washa tena Zawadi kwenye

earningsClaimDefault.message: Zawadi zako kutoka kwenye Matangazo zipo hapa!

disabledPanelTextTwo.message: Pata kipato kwa kutazama matangazo yanayoheshimu faragha, na yalipie moja kwa moja kuwasaidia watengeneza maudhui unaowapenda.

serviceText.message: Kwa kubofya 'Wezesha Brave Rewards', unaashiria kwamba umesoma kukubali

walletVerified.description: Status button that tells user that he is verified

walletVerifiedNotification.description: Title for notification when wallet becomes verified

walletVerifiedTextNotification.message: Hongera! Pochi yako ya $name$ ilithibitishwa vizuri na tayari kuongeza na kutoa pesa.
walletVerifiedTextNotification.description: Title for notification when wallet becomes verified

walletDisconnectedNotification.description: Title for notification when wallet is disconnected.

walletDisconnectedTextNotification.message: Usiwe na wasiwasi. Hii inaweza kutendeka kwa sababu mbalimbali za usalama. Kuunganisha tena pochi yako kutatua tatizo hili.
walletDisconnectedTextNotification.description: Title for notification when wallet is disconnected

connectedText.message: Mtengeneza maudhui huyu bado hajajisajili ili kuanza kupokea michango kutoka kwa watumiaji wa Brave. Zawadi yoyote utakayotuma itabaki kwenye wallet yako hadi watakapokamilisha mchakato huu.
connectedText.description: Text shown for connected publishers that are not fully verified in the panel

set.description: Button text for setting monthly contribution

changeAmount.description: Button text for changing monthly contribution amount

loginMessageTitle.message: Kuthibitisha pochi hukuruhusu kudhibiti fedha zako vizuri zaidi.

loginMessageText.message:
Unahitaji 25 BAT za chini zaidi ili kufungua akaunti ya Uphold. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye. 
 Ikiwa tayari umethibitishwa akaunti ya Uphold, ingia.

walletConnected.description: Status button that tells user that he is connected

walletPending.description: Status button that tells user that he is currently pending

walletVerificationNote3.message: Dokezo: Miamala yako itaonekana kwa $provider$ mara unapoidhinisha; kwa mfano, wataweza kuona mpokeaji na kiasi cha bahshishi yako.
walletVerificationNote3.description: Displayed in login modal for external wallet providers

onboardingEarnText.message: Pata tokeni kwa kutazama matangazo yanayoheshimu faragha na ufadhili tovuti na waundaji wa maudhui unaopenda kiotomatiki.

onboardingSetupContributeHeader.message: Ungependa kuwapa wasanii unaowapenda msaada kiasi gani kila mwezi?

onboardingTerms.message: Kwa kuendelea, unakubali $tos_link_begin$Sheria na Masharti$tos_link_end$ na $pp_link_begin$Sera ya Faragha$pp_link_end$.

onboardingPanelWelcomeText.message: Brave Private Ads hukuzawidi tokeni ili kusaidia waundaji maudhui kinyume na matangazo ya jadi, yote huku ukidumisha faragha ya taarifa zako binafsi.

onboardingPanelAdsText.message: Brave Private Ads itaonekana kama arifa ya kawaida. Huwezi kudhibiti mara ambazo unaona matangazo haya katika mipangilio.

onboardingPanelScheduleText.message: Tokeni ulizopata kutoka Brave Private Ads mwezi mzima wa sasa zitawasili tarehe 5 mwezi ujao.

onboardingPanelAcText.message: Waundaji wanapokea michango yako ya tokeni kiotomatiki kulingana na viwango vya ushirikishaji tunavyopima kuwa ‘Attention’.

onboardingPanelTippingText.message: Kutoa bahshishi ni njia ya kuhimiza na kufadhili binafsi maudhui au waundaji unaopenda. Toa bahshishi!

onboardingPanelRedeemText.message: Tokeni zinaweza kutumiwa zaidi ya kuwasaidia waundaji. Unaweza kununua maudhui ya dijitali na bidhaa nyingine wauzaji wanapokuja.

onboardingPanelCompleteText.message: Kwa kutumia Zawadi za Brave, unasaidia kufanya wavuti kuwa mahali bora pa kila mtu. Na hilo ni jambo bora!

onboardingPanelVerifySubtext.message: Ili kutoa tokeni unazopata kwa kutazama matangazo, utahitaji kuthibitisha pochi yako.

onboardingPanelBitflyerNote.message: Pochi ya bitFlyer ni huduma inayodhibitiwa na bitFlyer, Inc.

onboardingPanelBitflyerText.message: Kwa kuthibitisha pochi yako na kuiunganisha kwenye akaunti ya bitFlyer, utaweza kuhifadhi na kudhibiti tokeni ulizopata kupitia Brave Rewards kwa urahisi zaidi

bapDeprecationHeader.message: Brave Rewards nchini Japan inabadilisha hadi mfumo mpya!
bapDeprecationHeader.description: Header text for BAP deprecation warning message

bapDeprecationLearnMore.description: Link to learn more about BAP deprecation

bapDeprecationPopupText.message: Tafadhali tumia BAP yako kufikia tarehe 13 Machi. Baada ya hapo, BAP itaacha kutumika.
